result.title: What is the difference between my these two codes?
result.content:
Question : http://codeforces.com/contest/246/problem/D Code 1 is being accepted but 2 is not.

Code 1:

include <bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;

vector li[100010]; set ans[100010]; int vis[100010]; int color[100010]; int node[100010];

int main(){

int n,m,i,j,c,l,r,ma=0,col;
cin>>n>>m;

for(i=1;i<=n;i++){
    cin>>color[i];
    node[color[i]]=1;
    }

while(m--){

    cin>>l>>r;
    if(color[l]!=color[r]){

        ans[color[l]].insert(color[r]);
        ans[color[r]].insert(color[l]);

    }

}

for(i=100000;i>0;i--){

    if(ans[i].size()>=ma && node[i]==1){

            ma=ans[i].size();
            col=i;

    }

}

cout<<col;

}

Code 2:

include <bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;

vector li[100010]; set ans[100010]; int vis[100010]; int color[100010]; int node[100010];

void dfs(int x){

if(vis[x]==1)
    return;

vis[x]=1;

for(int i=0;i<li[x].size();i++){

    if(vis[li[x][i]]==0){

        if(color[x]!=color[li[x][i]]){

            ans[color[x]].insert(color[li[x][i]]);
            ans[color[li[x][i]]].insert(color[x]);


        }
        dfs(li[x][i]);

    }

}

return;

}

int main(){

int n,m,i,j,c,l,r,ma=0,col;
cin>>n>>m;

for(i=1;i<=n;i++){
    cin>>color[i];
    node[color[i]]=1;
    }

while(m--){

    cin>>l>>r;
    li[l].push_back(r);
    li[r].push_back(l);

}

for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
    dfs(i);

for(i=100000;i>0;i--){

    if(ans[i].size()>=ma && node[i]==1){

            ma=ans[i].size();
            col=i;

    }

}

cout<<col;

}
